mapper.sql: wall_id, account_id, title, content, img, `label`, gmt_creat, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into wall (wall_id, account_id, title, content, img, `label`, gmt_creat, gmt_modified) values (#{wallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreat,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into wall
wall_id,
account_id,
title,
content,
img,
`label`,
gmt_creat,
gmt_modified,

mapper.update:
update wall
account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
`label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_creat = #{gmtCreat,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where wall_id = #{wallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wall set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, `label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_creat = #{gmtCreat,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT} where wall_id = #{wallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from wall order by gmt_creat desc limit #{num};
select * from wall where gmt_creat between #{startTime} and #{endTime};
mapper.delete: delete from wall where wall_id = #{wallId} and account_id = #{accountId};
